info.title: Invoice API
info.description: The Holded's Invoicing API is organized around REST, using HTTP responses code to keep you informed about what's going on. Our endpoints will returns you metada in JSON format directly from Holded.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Must be an exact match, including special characters like "+", "#", and "-".

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Must be an exact match, including special characters like "+", "#", and "-".

parameters.name: customId
parameters.description: Return only the contacts that matches with the provided customId

shippingAddresses.name: Mapple shipping address
shippingAddresses.privateNotes: This is a private note, don't read it

type.description: Options: supplier, debtor, creditor, client, lead

isperson.description: When true the contact is created as a Contact Person instead of as a Company

taxOperation.description: options for Spain (general, intra, impexp, nosujeto, receq, exento)

numberingSeries.description: The value of each document should be a valid ID.

currency.description: Currency ISO code in lowercase (e.g., eur = Euro, usd = U.S. Dollar, etc )

language.description: options (es = spanish, en = english, fr = french, de = german, it = italian, ca = catalan, eu = euskera)

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: docType should be one of: {invoice, salesreceipt, creditnote, salesorder, proform, waybill,estimate, purchase, purchaseorder or purchaserefund}

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: docType should be one of: {invoice, salesreceipt, creditnote, salesorder, proform, waybill,estimate, purchase, purchaseorder or purchaserefund}

parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: Filtering by paid status. 0 = not paid, 1 = paid, 2 = partially paid

parameters.name: billed
parameters.description: Filtering by billed status. 0 = not billed, 1 = billed

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort documents. Options: `created-asc` to sort by creation date of documents in ascending order or `created-desc` to sort by creation date of documents in descending order

get.description: Get all your documents by type.

applyContactDefaults.description: Contact defaults are applied by default. If you don't want to apply it, set this field to false

contactCode.description: (NIF / CIF / VAT) Field required if you want to choose an existing contact and contactId field is empty

contactId.description: (Contact ID) Field required if you want to choose an existing contact and contactCode field is empty

contactName.description: Field required if contactCode and contactId fields are empty and you want to create a new contact

warehouseId.description: Choose the warehouse for your salesorder, purchaseorder or waybill.

approveDoc.description: Choose if the document needs to be approved or not. The default option is False.

tax.description: IVA percentage. In case you need to inform more than one tax, use the field taxes instead

key.description: key should be one of: {mrw, ups, fedex,tnt, seur, nacex, correos, asm, uspostalservice, dbschenker, royalmail, bluedart, palletways, correosexpress, tourline, other (for custom)}

name.description: name should be one of: {mrw, ups, fedex,tnt, seur, nacex, correos, asm, United States Postal Service, dbschenker, royalmail, bluedart, palletways, correosexpress, tourline, custom name (for custom)}

num.description: Tracking numbers. Can be added more numbers separated by , or -

pickUpDate.description: pickUpDate should be formated like DD/MM/YYYY

deliveryDate.description: deliveryDate should be formated like DD/MM/YYYY
